duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage system administration, database, and application servers, including installation, maintenance, and upgrades.
Create, manage, and delete domain user accounts in Azure Active Directory and Windows Active Directory.
Evaluate and deploy all software and hardware upgrades to the server, desktop, storage, and network infrastructure.
Initiate and manage vendor partnerships, procurement, and maintenance of all IT infrastructures.
Troubleshoot networks, intranet, and internet connectivity throughout the organization.
Provide end-user support and issue resolution using agreed-upon tools and methodologies.
Create and maintain documentation for all processes and procedures.
Provide project management services to clients and participate in the development of sales proposals and marketing materials.
Initiate research and evaluation of technologies, tools, and procedures to support business requirements.
Coordinate with the rest of the company to meet company objectives and support the work of other staff engaged in similar functions.

education_certification.credential: Four-year degree from an accredited college or university. Minimum of six years relevant working experience, including system administration, infrastructure design, and deployment experience. One or more professional or vendor certifications.
